comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: I am unsure how it works, as I have never tried it. But I feel that there is an unwatch button when you enter the thread. What if you click on that? I tried the same right after seeing your post and await the result. I will share my result with you while you can wait for others if they can come up with any solution. You can always click on Mark all messages as read. But, this is not a permanent solution. It will there again once a user post a new reply on that bounty thread.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on March 19, 2023, 04:06:44 PMhow can i make this type of notification hidden or make the post to not show in my "show new replies to your posts" section, I am sorry to say, but I do not think it is possible to make this type of notification hidden. The whole purpose of this feature is to keep you updated on new activity related to your posts. Quote from: cafter on March 19, 2023, 04:06:44 PMI participated first time in bounty campaign but how can i get rid of this unwanted notification.If you do not want to go through and read every single thread, you can simply click on "mark all messages as read" which will clear the list. At least until the next reply in one of those threads.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Unwatching a thread does not remove it from your "Show new replies to your posts" list as they are two different forum options. AFAIK, there's no way to remove a thread from the new reply list after you have made a reply there. Just use the watchlist to follow threads instead, as you can easily choose what to add and remove from it.
